numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that people who are 15 to 24 years old say that the world is getting better with each generation.
2. I wonder how older people feel about younger people.
4. In my community, young adults are more optimistic than older adults.
5. In my community, young adults think of different ways to help the future.
6. I ask whether the younger generation can help to improve the future for future generations.
7. The headline is: Young adults are optimistic about the world getting better with each generation.
